body.p: In allocating a reversal of an impairment loss for a cash‑generating unit in accordance with paragraph 122, the carrying amount of an asset shall not be increased above the lower of:

li.p: the carrying amount that would have been determined (net of amortisation or depreciation) had no impairment loss been recognised for the asset in prior periods.

body.p: The amount of the reversal of the impairment loss that would otherwise have been allocated to the asset shall be allocated pro rata to the other assets of the unit, except for goodwill.
